title: Best of The Herd: 08/29/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/29/2019
description:
Colin says the Cowboys have no excuse to not win even without Zeke because their schedule is easy early and throughout.  Greg Cosell of NFL Films breaks down the NFC and AFC West divisions.  Plus, Colin debuts a new College Football segment where he picks his top 3 games against the spread heading into the first full weekend of College Football.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
